body: The same spell can sometimes produce varying effects if applied to the same recipient more than once. Usually the last spell in the series trumps the others. None of the previous spells are actually removed or dispelled, but their effects become irrelevant while the final spell in the series lasts.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic/Casting Spells/Combining Magic Effects/Stacking Effects/Same Effect with Differing Results
name: Same Effect with Differing Results
